none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2018-10-iron-blood/extracted/Iron Blood/02 Return It To The Land As Ash

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 19, 2018 Description from Terminal Escape:
Oh you dark and dirty punks, what will you come up with next? In the meantime, and for wistful BONE AWL fans who just thought the later work was too damned polished, I offer you IRON BLOOD.  Now stomp your ass across that stage and look pissed.  WE WILL CHANGE
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IC1xyarsesM/W8l3QJxWKRI/AAAAAAAAUC0/ZlsiQbG6lg84Io2Hg24nepzIFZsMovs1gCEwYBhgL/s1600/Iron%2BBlood%2Bimg%2Bcopy.jpg
